/usr/bin/c++      CMakeFiles/BallInRoom.dir/BallInRoom.cpp.o  -o BallInRoom -rdynamic /lusr/opt/ogre-1.11/lib/libOgreBites.so.1.11.1 /lusr/opt/ogre-1.11/lib/libOgreHLMS.so.1.11.1 /lusr/opt/ogre-1.11/lib/libOgreMeshLodGenerator.so.1.11.1 /lusr/opt/ogre-1.11/lib/libOgreOverlay.so.1.11.1 /lusr/opt/ogre-1.11/lib/libOgreProperty.so.1.11.1 /lusr/opt/ogre-1.11/lib/libOgreRTShaderSystem.so.1.11.1 /lusr/opt/ogre-1.11/lib/libOgreTerrain.so.1.11.1 /lusr/opt/ogre-1.11/lib/libOgreVolume.so.1.11.1 /lusr/opt/ogre-1.11/lib/libOgrePaging.so.1.11.1 /lusr/opt/ogre-1.11/lib/libOgreMain.so.1.11.1 -lpthread -Wl,-rpath,/lusr/opt/ogre-1.11/lib
